physical_examinations.vital_signs: Weight: 9.7 kg (2 yr 10 months), Height: 81 cm (2 yr 10 months); GH therapy at 3-7 yr did not improve short stature. Height at 7 yr 5 months: 110 cm (2.10 percentile), Weight: 16.8 kg (15th percentile).
physical_examinations.relevant_findings: Joint stiffness, skin thinning, mottled hyperpigmentation at 15 months. Bird-like facies at 2 years. Sparse scalp hair, thin hyperpigmented skin, lipodystrophy of the gluteal region, extremities, palmar and plantar areas.
physical_examinations.changes_over_time: Weight and height showed poor growth initially, with GH treatment leading to some height improvement until developing GH resistance at age 5 years.
